channel.title: Jean-Luc Godard on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jean-Luc Godard on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Awakening’: With Timely Viennale Trailer, Joanna Hogg Follows in the Footsteps of David Lynch, Jean-Luc Godard
item.description: Check out the Vienna Film Festival’s 2025 teaser and past trailers from such legendary directors as Radu Jude, Leos Carax, Abel Ferrara, and Claire Denis, and one starring Natalie Portman.

item.title: ‘Awakening’: With Timely Viennale Trailer, Joanna Hogg Follows in the Footsteps of David Lynch, Jean-Luc Godard
item.description: Check out the Vienna Film Festival’s 2025 teaser and past trailers from such legendary directors as Radu Jude, Leos Carax, Abel Ferrara, and Claire Denis, and one starring Natalie Portman.

item.title: Zoey Deutch Plays Jean Seberg in Richard Linklater’s ‘Nouvelle Vague’ Trailer From Netflix
item.description: The film premiered at Cannes and centers on the shoot for Jean-Luc Godard’s ‘Breathless.’

item.title: Zoey Deutch Plays Jean Seberg in Richard Linklater’s ‘Nouvelle Vague’ Trailer From Netflix
item.description: The film premiered at Cannes and centers on the shoot for Jean-Luc Godard’s ‘Breathless.’

item.title: Gaumont Marks 130 Years With Academy Museum Retrospective
item.description: Classics from Gaumont’s library, including Godard’s ‘Weekend’ (1967) and Carl Theodor Dreyer’s ‘The Passion of Joan of Arc’ (1928), will be screened at the Los Angeles retrospective.

item.title: Gaumont Marks 130 Years With Academy Museum Retrospective
item.description: Classics from Gaumont’s library, including Godard’s ‘Weekend’ (1967) and Carl Theodor Dreyer’s ‘The Passion of Joan of Arc’ (1928), will be screened at the Los Angeles retrospective.
